Ask HN: Best site(s) to look for freelance illustrators/animation artists?
text: Hey all, I am trying to figure out if there is a better way to hire freelance illustrators/animation designers than our current workflow. This involves posting on upwork etc, scouring behance/dribbble. I am aware of designpickle and its like, but not of similar sites that focus on illustration/animation. Are there any? Thanks!
